name: UIFeedback
summary: Easy to use Feedback UI from anywhere in your code base.
description: UIFeedback provides an easy to use feedback from anywhere in your codebase. You can choose the font size of the UI, the font family. The FeedbackUI has two modes of operation - Normal & Error. For each of the modes you can configure the background color of the FeedbackUI separately. Tapping on the feedback UI dismisses it.
